text.language: I/#c# P,#c# Pennou]: af[i n~nefmay/t/c: af[itou cap~swi: m~pitwou n~Yabwr.
Jesus Christ our God, took His disciples, He brought them up, to Mount Tabor.

language.div: Yesus Kristus, Allah kita, telah membawa murid-murid-Nya, Ia telah membawa mereka , ke Gunung Tabor.

text.language: يسوع المسيح إلهنا أخذ تلاميذه وأصعدهم فوق جبل طابور.
?liac nem Mwuc/c petjwr: aunau e~nefh~bwc hi Yabwr: nimay/t/c euerjinior: n~][/pi ecerouwini.
Elijah and Moses the strong, saw His clothes on Tabor, the disciples passed through, a bright cloud.

language.div: Elia dan Musa yang kuat: melihat pakaian-Nya di Tabor: para murid melewati: melalui awan yang terang.

text.language: إيليا وموسى القويان نظرا ثيابه على طابور التلاميذ عبروا فى سحابة منيرة.
